thread.section_title: Figi's, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figi's, Inc. | www.figis.com
thread.title: Julie Ciesinski
thread.title_full: Figi's, Inc. reviewed by Julie Ciesinski

author: Julie Ciesinski
title: Julie Ciesinski
text: We received a gift from a relative that we believe was supposed to be a Christmas gift, but it came with a Valentine's sticker on it. What happened? Also, we were disappointed with the contents. We were going to use the cheese and sausage for guests that were coming to visit, but it wasn't enough for even two people sparingly! Less packaging and more contents - we know that any of these are not inexpensive for the gift-giver. Not good!!
